Text:
bad game very bad game 
this game is a piece of shit and dont angry me but this is the truth all city interactive games sucks

Yes most of city interactive games are bad, but I like their Sniper Ghost Warrior series. Those two games are a rare alternative to "SPRAY AND PRAY" type of FPS games. By spray I meant spray bullets. That's why I dislike what ubisoft did to their R6 and GR franchise.
I believe this version crashes after few missions (I tried the skidrow version a few years ago).
